item.title: Optical Circuit (encoded as a 360 degree spherical video)
item.description:
Optical Circuit (encoded as a 360 degree spherical video)

A 360 degree spherical video for Google Chrome Browser. The original version (demoscene PC 4K Intro) is here. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZT_rlKRT4K8 http://www.pouet.net/prod.php?which=65125

item.title: 360° meet the largest dinosaur ever discovered - Attenborough and the Giant Dinosaur - BBC One
item.description:
360° meet the largest dinosaur ever discovered - Attenborough and the Giant Dinosaur - BBC One

Programme website: http://bbc.in/1OpMiMh David Attenborough meets the biggest animal ever to walk on Earth, in 360 - a Titanosaur. Produced by the BBC Natural History Unit and Hello Charlie

item.title: #SpecialDelivery: Google Spotlight Stories come to YouTube with interactive 360-degree storytelling
item.description:
#SpecialDelivery: Google Spotlight Stories come to YouTube with interactive 360-degree storytelling

A humble caretaker is surprised when a mysterious stranger causes mischief on the roof. He investigates, but can't seem to catch even a glimpse of the troublemaker. And so the chase goes... room to room... up and down... The stranger remains just out of sight, leaving behind only a trail of gifts...

item.title: Interview with creators of Otherworldly
item.description:
Interview with creators of Otherworldly

We've seen plenty of rollercoaster experiences for the Oculus Rift, but Otherworldly is easily the most abstract and surreal. It's a 360-degree video experience, rendered with vibrant colours and featuring a bizarre twisting track. Released on Oculus Share just one week ago, the main purpose of the playing this game is not to finish a main...

item.title: 360° Caleidoscope Sirius - Mandelbulb 3D fractal 4K Ultra HD
item.description:
360° Caleidoscope Sirius - Mandelbulb 3D fractal 4K Ultra HD

360° Fractal animation made by Schizo - http://www.psykick.de featuring fantastic music by Psyrius. Use your Cardboard, Oculus Rift or other preferred virtual reality device to dive deep into this 3D fractal star and feel it all around you. Use clicked mouse, WASD-keys or navigation wheel when viewed on monitor or move your phone.

item.title: Journey to the inner Core
item.description:
Journey to the inner Core

A 360° fractal animation rendered for virtual reality. Enjoy the Journey. Read more at http://tillvonahnen.de/fractal/

item.title: The Most Important Movie of 2015 Is a VR Cartoon About a Hedgehog
item.description:
The Most Important Movie of 2015 Is a VR Cartoon About a Hedgehog

Right now the goal at Oculus Story Studio is move the Post-its. The true finish line is locking their latest animated virtual reality movie Henry, but to do that they have quite a few issues to fix.

item.title: Machine VR by Julius Horsthuis
item.description:
Machine VR by Julius Horsthuis

​Fractal fly-throughs can be boring - so I made this one extra long to make sure you would get super bored. That is unless you start to forget the world around you and let your imagination fill in the fractal void. Every nook and cranny will start to come alive - have a purpose.

item.title: Otherworldly 360° Theme Ride - Virtual Reality 360 degree 4K POV animation by MELT
item.description:
Otherworldly 360° Theme Ride - Virtual Reality 360 degree 4K POV animation by MELT

◤ This is a 360 degree video, click and drag to change the angle of view. ◤ Watch using Chrome browser on desktop or the YouTube app on Android devices to view in 360 degrees. ◤ PLEASE WATCH IN HIGHEST RESOLUTION POSSIBLE WITH HEADPHONES o.O Probably the weirdest rollercoaster experience in Parallel Dimension :) DOWNLOAD for GEAR VR: http://bit.ly/otherworldly-gear-vr Our first 360 3D animation.

item.title: 360° Animation: Zurich2.0, Musical Interpretation Niki Reiser
item.description:
360° Animation: Zurich2.0, Musical Interpretation Niki Reiser

On behalf of the Zurich Film Foundation Animation: Dirk Koy, Equipo Music: Niki Reiser
